text: While some women long for the bodies they had in their teens and early 20s, Lea Michele says that at 30, she's never loved her body more. The Glee star, who just hit the big 3 - 0 on August 30, posed for the cover of People's new Special Wellness Issue and explained just how she keeps her figure looking so amazing.'I've never loved my body more than I do right now,'she said.'And I'm so grateful that I feel that way.'Talkin'body : Lea Michele posed for the cover of People magazine's Special Wellness Issue Totally naked : Earlier this year, the star showed off some major body confidence and stripped down for Women's Health UK Feeling good : She said she's never loved her body more than she
